title: Ghost Stories - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/15/22
itunes:title: Ghost Stories - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/15/22
description:
Guest host Richard Syrett and paranormal podcaster Jim Harold discuss the popularity of ghost stories and the truth behind stories of supernatural events, plus share tales of a ghostly mechanic and a possessed child in a foster home.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
